00077 /*
00078 #ifdef _WIN32
00079 #ifndef __MIN_MAX__
00080 #define __MIN_MAX__
00081 namespace std {
00082 //
00083 // undefine macros min and max to avoid conflicts with template names
00084 //
00085 #ifdef min
00086 #undef min
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 #ifdef max
00090 #undef max
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 //
00094 // template functions 'min' and 'max' are not defined for _WIN32
00095 // due to name conflicts
00096 //
00097 template < class T > inline T min( T a, T b ) { return a < b ? a : b; }
00098 template < class T > inline T max( T a, T b ) { return a > b ? a : b; }
00099 }
00100 #endif
00101 #endif
00102 */
00103 
00104 using namespace std;

00106 //===========================================================================
00172 void bfgs
00173 (
00174     Array< double >& p,
00175     double    gtol,
00176     unsigned& iter,
00177     double&   fret,
00178     double  (*func)( const Array< double >& ),
00179     void   (*dfunc)( const Array< double >&, Array< double >& ),
00180     unsigned  iterMax,
00181     LinMinTypes linmintype
00182 )
00183 {
00184     SIZE_CHECK( p.ndim( ) == 1 )
00185 
00186     const double   EPS   = 1e-12; // 3.0e-8;
00187     const double   TOLX  = 4 * EPS;
00188     const double   STPMX = 100.;
00189 
00190     unsigned i,its,j;
00191     double   den,fac,fad,fae,fp,stpmax,sum,sumdg,sums,temp,test;
00192 
00193     unsigned        n = p.nelem( );
00194     Array< double > dg  ( n );
00195     Array< double > g   ( n );
00196     Array< double > Hdg ( n );
00197     Array< double > H   ( n, n );
00198     Array< double > pnew( n );
00199     Array< double > s   ( n );
00200 
00201     fp = func( p );
00202     dfunc( p, g );
00203     SIZE_CHECK( g.samedim( p ) )
00204 
00205     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00206         for( H( i, i ) = 1., j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00207             H( i, j ) = H( j, i ) = 0.;
00208         s( i ) = -g( i );
00209         sum += p( i ) * p( i );
00210     }
00211 
00212     stpmax = STPMX * std::max( sqrt( sum ), ( double ) n );
00213 
00214     for( its = 1; its <= iterMax; its++ ) {
00215         iter = its;
00216 
00217         //
00218         // line search
00219         //
00220         switch (linmintype) {
00221           case LNSRCH : 
00222               bool check;
00223               lnsrch( p, fp, g, s, pnew, fret, stpmax, check, func );
00224               cout << "check = " << check << endl;
00225               break;
00226           case CBLNSRCH :
00227               cblnsrch( p, fp, g, s, pnew, fret, func );
00228               break;
00229           case LINMIN :
00230               pnew = p;
00231               linmin( pnew, s, fret, func );
00232               break;
00233           case DERIVLINMIN :
00234               pnew = p;
00235               dlinmin( pnew, s, fret, func, dfunc );
00236               break;
00237           default : // DERIVLINMIN
00238               pnew = p;
00239               dlinmin( pnew, s, fret, func, dfunc );
00240               break;
00241         }
00242 
00243         fp = fret;
00244         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00245             s( i ) = pnew( i ) - p( i );
00246             p ( i ) = pnew( i );
00247         }
00248 
00249         test = 0.;
00250         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00251             temp = fabs( s( i ) ) / std::max( fabs( p( i ) ), 1.);
00252             if( temp > test )
00253                 test = temp;
00254         }
00255 
00256         if( test < TOLX )
00257             return;
00258 
00259         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00260             dg( i ) = g( i );
00261 
00262         dfunc( p, g );
00263         test = 0.;
00264         den  = std::max( fret, 1. );
00265         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00266             temp = fabs( g( i ) ) * std::max( fabs( p( i ) ), 1. ) / den;
00267             if( temp > test )
00268                 test = temp;
00269         }
00270 
00271         if( test < gtol )
00272             return;
00273 
00274         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00275             dg( i ) = g( i ) - dg( i );
00276 
00277         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00278             for( Hdg( i ) = 0., j = 0; j < n; j++ )
00279                 Hdg( i ) += H( i, j ) * dg( j );
00280 
00281         fac = fae = sumdg = sums = 0.;
00282         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00283             fac   += dg( i ) * s  ( i );
00284             fae   += dg( i ) * Hdg( i );
00285             sumdg += dg( i ) * dg ( i );
00286             sums  += s ( i ) * s  ( i );
00287         }
00288 
00289         if( fac * fac > EPS * sumdg * sums ) {
00290             fac = 1. / fac;
00291             fad = 1. / fae;
00292 
00293             for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00294                 dg( i ) = fac * s( i ) - fad * Hdg( i );
00295 
00296             for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00297                 for( j = 1; j < n; j++ )
00298                     H( i, j ) += fac * s( i ) * s( j )
00299                       - fad * Hdg( i ) * Hdg( j ) + fae * dg( i ) * dg( j );
00300         }
00301 
00302         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00303             for( s( i ) = 0., j = 0; j < n; j++ )
00304                 s( i ) -= H( i, j ) * g( j );
00305     }
00306 }
